main event: A single object made of aluminum or gilding foil was observed rolling horizontally in Alexandria, VA on March 18, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15-20 seconds without making any sound., No other reports were found in the area regarding this sighting., The object had no tail or spin and was noted to be rolling., The object appeared to be shiny aluminum., Only one witness has come forward to report this sighting, limiting the possibility of confirmation from other sources.
sighted object: one object made of aluminum or gilding foil
witness description: only one witness reported the sighting
